name: Synthony
description:
This game was made as part of the 2022 Global Game Jam. The theme was duality, I was in team Mystery Wombats and we decided to do a runner that focused on the duality between past and future music and polyrhythms.

This game has quite a few bugs but it works! 

Here are the credits for me and the other members:

Paul Quinones - Programming and Art and Gameplay Design
Erica Jackson - Programming and Gameplay Design
Mercedes Drayton - Art and Animation and Gameplay Design
Maury Brown- UI and Level Design and Gameplay Design
Ben Dahl - Original Music and Gameplay Design and Mascot
